_source.text: 12 The focus of the renewal expectancy must therefore be prospective rather than retrospective: it must be used only to the extent it predicts that continued service by the licensee will better serve the public interest during the next term, and not because the public interest was met during the expired term.

text: must be used only to the extent it predicts that continued service by the licensee **will** **better** serve
the public interest during the **next** term, and not **because** the public interest was met during the expired term.
